# core-dropdown

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                        | Type                            | Default  |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------- | -------- |
| `active`    | `active`    | The option-list visibility                                         | `boolean`                       | `false`  |
| `alignment` | `alignment` | The element alignment                                              | `"center" \| "left" \| "right"` | `"left"` |
| `direction` | `direction` | The option-lists direction to expand.                              | `"down" \| "up"`                | `"down"` |
| `hoverable` | `hoverable` | The option-list will show up when hovering the option-list-trigger | `boolean`                       | `false`  |
| `wrap`      | `wrap`      | The option-list will wrap if applied.                              | `boolean`                       | `false`  |
